detail_desc: Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a sheen with a sewn-in wrapover and draping at the front with an inset chiffon section, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper a soft, loose knit with cable-knit and pointelle sections, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back and an elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Bra in microfibre with lace trims and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Lightweight nylon jacket with an embroidered motif on the chest, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Lace A-line dress with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck, short cap sleeves and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Short trenchcoat in soft, stretch imitation suede with rounded notch lapels and a loose yoke front and back. Side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Unlined.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Boxy-style shirt in airy organza with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Short sleeves, two open chest pockets, and slits in the sides.
Pouch in transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 9x10x18 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Basketball-inspired sports vest top in fast-drying, breathable mesh with a print motif on the front and inset panels at the sides.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Rain jacket in patterned wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in viscose crêpe jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, flounced sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a back pocket.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in lace with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Knee-length dress in soft jersey with short sleeves, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Striped T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small embroidered detail on the chest and a narrow trim around the neckline. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a straight-cut hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled and the cotton is organic.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with print motifs. Long-sleeved top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Cardigan knitted in soft cotton with long sleeves and buttons down the front.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled cotton weave with short, smock-trimmed puff sleeves, a low-cut neck with an opening and ties at the top and a smocked hem.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave. Elasticated waist with a decorative bow at the front, fake front pockets and elasticated hems.
Sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a decorative appliqué on the knees.
Jersey hair elastics without metal clips.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in soft viscose jersey.
Ballet pumps with scalloped edges. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top and crotch.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cargo trousers in hard-washed cotton denim with a high, elasticated waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, flap leg pockets and slim, ankle-length legs with elasticated hems.
Metal rings in various designs.
Jacket in washed stretch twill with appliqués and a collar. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Slightly wider, straight-cut T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with decorative stitching around the sleeves and hem.
Pull-on trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Longer, sleeveless top in patterned, pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline, slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top, a foldover polo neck and long sleeves.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.

Seamless body in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Large hair clips in metal decorated with glass beads. Length 9 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, sleeveless top in loosely crocheted cotton with a V-neck. The top is heavy and should be stored flat to keep its shape.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top.
Long vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with deep armholes, twisted side seams and a rounded,raw-edge hem.
Body in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a wide lace trim. Seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a marled knit containing some wool with ribbed side sections, slits in the sides and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit cardigan in soft organic cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Joggers in washed, stretch cotton twill with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching and covered elastication at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Parka woven in a cotton blend with a lined hood, collar, and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a press-stud at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved body with a low-cut back and press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
